template <dimension_type D>
class vsip::impl::Applied_layout<Rt_layout<D>>
File: ../../../vsip/core/layout.hpp

Applied run-time layout. This object gets created for run-time extdata access. Efficiency is important to reduce library interface overhead. Don't store the whole Rt_layout, only the parts we need: the complex_format and part of the dimension-order.

Primary template: Applied_layout
-Public Member function templates

Construct Applied_layout object.

Template parameters:

ExtentT:a type capable of encoding an extent (Length or Domain)

Arguments:

layout:the run-time layout.
extent:the extent of the data to layout.
elem_size:the size of a data element (in bytes).
